org.grouplens.lenskit.data.sql

Class BasicSQLStatementFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.sql.BasicSQLStatementFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SQLStatementFactory

    public class BasicSQLStatementFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements SQLStatementFactory

    Default implementation of the SQL statement factory.

public java.lang.String getTableName()

        Get the name of the rating table.

      • setTableName

        public void setTableName(@Nonnull
                java.lang.String name)

        Set the name of the rating table.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the rating table. This table name is used without escaping to build SQL queries, so include whatever escaping or quotations are needed to make the name valid in the backing DBMS in the name here.

      • getTimestampColumn

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String getTimestampColumn()

        Get the name of the timestamp column in the rating table (or null if there is no timestamp column).

        Returns:
        The timestamp column name, or null if no timestamp is used.

      • setTimestampColumn

        public void setTimestampColumn(@Nullable
                      java.lang.String col)

        Set the name of the timestamp column in the rating table. Set to null if there is no timestamp column.

        Parameters:
        col - The name of the timestamp column, or null. This column name is used without escaping to build SQL queries, so include whatever escaping or quotations are needed to make the name valid in the backing DBMS in the name here.

      • prepareUsers

        public java.lang.String prepareUsers()
        Description copied from interface: SQLStatementFactory

        Prepare a statement to satisfy UserDAO.getUserIds(). Querying the statement should return one column per row containing the numeric user ID.

        Specified by:
        prepareUsers in interface SQLStatementFactory
        Returns:
        A string for a sql query containing user ID data.

      • prepareItems

        public java.lang.String prepareItems()
        Description copied from interface: SQLStatementFactory

        Prepare a statement to satisfy ItemDAO.getItemIds(). Querying the statement should return one column per row containing the numeric item ID.

        Specified by:
        prepareItems in interface SQLStatementFactory
        Returns:
        A string for a sql query containing item ID data.

      • prepareEvents

        public java.lang.String prepareEvents(SortOrder order)
        Description copied from interface: SQLStatementFactory

        Prepare a statement to satisfy EventDAO.streamEvents(Class, SortOrder). Each row should contain three or four columns: the user ID, the item ID, the rating, and (optionally) the timestamp. The timestamp column is allowed to contain NULL values or to be omitted entirely. User, item, and rating columns must be non-null.

        Specified by:
        prepareEvents in interface SQLStatementFactory
        Parameters:
        order - The sort order

      • prepareUserEvents

        public java.lang.String prepareUserEvents()
        Description copied from interface: SQLStatementFactory

        Prepare a statement to satisfy UserEventDAO.getEventsForUser(long). The returned rows should be as in SQLStatementFactory.prepareEvents(SortOrder), and the prepared statement should take a single parameter for the user ID.

        Specified by:
        prepareUserEvents in interface SQLStatementFactory
        Returns:
        A string for a sql query returning user rating data. The ratings must be in timestamp order.

      • prepareItemEvents

        public java.lang.String prepareItemEvents()
        Description copied from interface: SQLStatementFactory

        Prepare a statement to satisfy ItemEventDAO.getEventsForItem(long). The returned rows should be as in SQLStatementFactory.prepareEvents(SortOrder), and the prepared statement should take a single parameter for the item ID.

        Specified by:
        prepareItemEvents in interface SQLStatementFactory
        Returns:
        A string for a sql query returning item rating data. The ratings must be ordered first by user ID, then by timestamp.

      • prepareItemUsers

        public java.lang.String prepareItemUsers()
        Description copied from interface: SQLStatementFactory

        Prepare a statement to satisfy ItemEventDAO.getUsersForItem(long). The returned rows should each contain a user ID as their only column, and the statement should take a single parameter for the item ID.

        Specified by:
        prepareItemUsers in interface SQLStatementFactory
        Returns:
        A string for a sql query returning item rating data. The ratings must be ordered first by user ID, then by timestamp.
